statements: SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials
SELECT trial_name, participants FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE duration_weeks > 6
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, treatment FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE participants > 100 ORDER BY trial_id DESC
SELECT trial_name, efficacy_rating, safety_rating FROM ClinicalTrials ORDER BY efficacy_rating DESC, safety_rating ASC
SELECT trial_name, treatment, duration_weeks FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE efficacy_rating > 0.8 AND safety_rating > 0.7
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE duration_weeks > 10 ORDER BY efficacy_rating DESC, safety_rating ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, treatment FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE participants > 100 ORDER BY trial_name ASC
SELECT trial_name, treatment, participants FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE efficacy_rating > 4.0 AND safety_rating > 3.0
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, duration_weeks, participants FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE treatment LIKE 'Chemotherapy%'
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE duration_weeks BETWEEN 8 AND 12
SELECT * FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM drugs WHERE drug_type='Antibiotic';
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, dosage FROM drugs WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT drug_name, drug_type, dosage FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE drug_type='Antipyretic' AND dosage < 100 ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, drug_type, dosage FROM drugs WHERE drug_type = 'Antibiotic' ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT trial_id, drug_id, patient_id, efficacy_score FROM trial_results WHERE efficacy_score > 0.7 ORDER BY trial_id DESC;

SELECT drug_name, dosage, trial_results.efficacy_score FROM drugs JOIN trial_results ON drugs.drug_id = trial_results.drug_id WHERE trial_results.efficacy_score > 0.7 ORDER BY drug_name, trial_results.efficacy_score DESC;

SELECT drug_name, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage, COUNT(trial_id) AS total_trials FROM drugs JOIN trial_results ON drugs.drug_id = trial_results.drug_id GROUP BY drug_name HAVING total_trials > 5 ORDER BY avg_dosage DESC;

SELECT trial_id, drug_name, efficacy_score, safety_rating FROM trial_results JOIN drugs ON trial_results.drug_id = drugs.drug_id WHERE efficacy_score > 0.8 AND safety_rating > 3 ORDER BY efficacy_score DESC, safety_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT treatment_name, enrollment_count, start_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE enrollment_count > 50;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_id, effectiveness_score, side_effects FROM trial_results WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM trial_results WHERE side_effects IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC, enrollment_count ASC;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 40 AND health_condition = 'Diabetes';
SELECT treatment_name, COUNT(*) AS num_patients FROM clinical_trials JOIN patient_data USING (trial_id) GROUP BY treatment_name HAVING num_patients > 5;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND trial_id IN (SELECT trial_id FROM patient_data WHERE age <= 30);
SELECT trial_id, AVG(effectiveness_score) AS avg_score FROM trial_results GROUP BY trial_id ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM patients GROUP BY diagnosis;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT trial_name, location, phase, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE phase = 3;
SELECT treatment_name, dosage, duration, start_date, end_date FROM treatments ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, registration_date FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, dosage, duration FROM Treatments WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date, lead_researcher FROM Trials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, event_description, event_date FROM Patients JOIN AdverseEvents ON Patients.patient_id = AdverseEvents.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, weight FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE dosage > 100 AND duration < 30;
SELECT trial_name, end_date, lead_researcher FROM Trials ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name, Trials.trial_name FROM Patients JOIN TrialResults ON Patients.patient_id = TrialResults.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON TrialResults.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id JOIN Trials ON TrialResults.trial_id = Trials.trial_id;
SELECT patient_name, event_description, event_date FROM Patients JOIN AdverseEvents ON Patients.patient_id = AdverseEvents.patient_id WHERE YEAR(event_date) = 2022;
